t: Merit Brass Company Acquires Supply Source Products
s: Since their initial investment, Company leaders observed increasing demand for their new offering of press fittings and valves from their wholesaler customers. To support their strategy and customers more intimately, Merit began the process of taking full ownership of Supply Source Products in March, 2022.
